code: import{loaderConstant}from'../_constants';export function loading(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:false;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case loaderConstant.LOADINGTRUE:return true;case loaderConstant.LOADINGFALSE:return false;default:return state;}}
